It is believed that with available medical, psychiatric, clinical and production
facilities and staffs, at key points around the U.S., an integrated series could be
produced which would tap the principal resources of the United States in Mental Health.
It is our belief that one of our member institutions, such as the University of
Minnesota or Michigan, could be entrusted with the type of quality production
needed.
